DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study assess efficacy letrozole ovulation induction agent test hypothesis letrozole generate well pregnancy rate fewer multiple pregnancy higher live birth rate current standard agent , clomifene citrate anovular infertile woman polycystic ovarian syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Letrozole Versus Clomifene Citrate Ovulation Induction
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : 18 39 2 . BMI < 36 3 . Infertility due anovulation 4 . PCOS : At least two follow diagnostic criterion : 1 . Oligo/amenorrhoea 2 . Hyperandrogenaemia : biochemical ( testosterone ≥2.5 nmol/l free androgen index ( FAI ) ≥ 5 ) clinical ( acne/hirsutism ) evidence 3 . USS evidence PCO ( either ≥12 follicles measure 29 mm diameter , ovarian volume > 10 ml ) 5 . No recent ( within 6 month ) treatment induction ovulation 6 . Normal semen analysis ( WHO 1999 ) 7 . Proven patency least one Fallopian tube 1 . Inability give inform consent 2 . Contraindication letrozole clomifene citrate 3 . Absence inclusion criterion
